author: PlayStation
description:
Astro Bot returns with a new delightful twist!
 
DualSense wireless controller - Astro Bot Joyful Limited Edition launches October 30, with pre-orders starting September 12 at 10am local time at https://direct.playstation.com and participating retailers.

Dive back into supersized adventures with ASTRO and this limited-edition controller!
title: Astro Bot Joyful Limited Edition DualSense Controller | PS5

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10015357

Take up the challenge of rebuilding a once glorious pirate utopia in Republic of Pirates, an intrepid city-builder with real-time naval combat coming to PlayStation 5 on 25th September 2025.

Develop your humble outpost into a sprawling archipelago-spanning republic. Invest in production buildings and distribute valuable goods across a network of docks and depots to address the needs of your citizens. Recruit heroic captains and command a powerful fleet of ships as you take to the waves in the name of conquest and glory. Discover and liberate islands, defeat rival factions, and navigate complex diplomatic relationships with the most influential national trading companies of the era.

#ps5 #ps5games #republicofpirates
title: Republic of Pirates - Gameplay Overview Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
METAL EDEN is officially out now on PlayStation 5!

From Reikon Games, creators of RUINER, and published by Deep Silver, METAL EDEN delivers an adrenaline-fueled sci-fi FPS experience like no other.

In METAL EDEN, you play as ASKA, an android built around a digitized human mind, fighting for truth in a fractured, post-human world. Explore the decaying techno-planet Moebius, descend into the world below, and battle for control over the souls of a lost colony, now stored in cybernetic COREs.

With your sentient spacecraft Nexus by your side, expand your arsenal, upgrade your body, and face a relentless roster of enemies in an escalating war for what’s real, and what’s worth saving.

#ps5 #ps5games

Rated Mature
title: Metal Eden - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/zombie-army-vr/

Zombie Army VR is OUT NOW on PlayStation VR2!
Available to all players as a free update, Zombie Army VR’s Horde Mode will see you fend off increasingly dangerous waves of undead masses across four new gruesome maps. But, if the challenge is too much, you need not face this horror alone, as you can call-in a comrade to help you face down the zombie apocalypse. 

Along with the nail-biting action, precision gunplay and brutal melee that you will experience as you fight for your life in Horde Mode. The update also brings with it the new Black Ice and Toxic Hazard weapon skins to the game, along with legendary Deadhunters Marie and Boris all of which is free to all players.

About Zombie Army VR
Zombie Hitler has been defeated, but the zombie hordes are still at large, and Europe remains in the throes of war. Following the story of Zombie Army, you return to the field as one of the Deadhunters, an elite squad fighting to end the apo
title: Zombie Army VR - Horde Mode Trailer | PS VR2 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/helldivers-2/#buy-now

Set coordinates for the Terminid Hive Worlds – and pack the extra-strength bug spray. We’re exterminating the galaxy’s most disgusting infestation in a patriotic payback mission of no mercy.

Abhorrent new enemy types, thrilling missions, strange worlds and spectacular beasts await the bravest Helldiver units. Did somebody call pest control?

Dive now in HELLDIVERS™ 2 on PS5 and PC today (+cross-play); and prepare to inject a dose of managed democracy to enemies of Super Earth.

#ps5 #ps5games #pcgames #helldivers2

title: Helldivers 2 - Into the Unjust Launch Trailer | PS5 & PC Games
